# 基于深度学习的推荐系统研究综述（黄立威等）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/jiyu-shendu-xuexi-de-tuijian-xitong-yanjiu-zongshu-huangliwei-deng
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/jiyu-shendu-xuexi-de-tuijian-xitong-yanjiu-zongshu-huangliwei-deng
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install jiyu-shendu-xuexi-de-tuijian-xitong-yanjiu-zongshu-huangliwei-deng
jiyu-shendu-xuexi-de-tuijian-xitong-yanjiu-zongshu-huangliwei-deng <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g jiyu-shendu-xuexi-de-tuijian-xitong-yanjiu-zongshu-huangliwei-deng
jiyu-shendu-xuexi-de-tuijian-xitong-yanjiu-zongshu-huangliwei-deng <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
